ref: 8237 pīnasa -- , v.l. pin˚, apīnasa -- m. ʻ cold in the nose ʼ Suśr. 2. *pināsa -- . [pi ~ ápi, nás -- 1: cf. apikakṣá -- m. ʻ region of the armpits ʼ RV., apikarṇá -- n. ʻ do. of the ears ʼ RV. Other more generally accepted derivations in EWA ii 293]
Or. pinasa ʻ cold in the head ʼ, pinisa ʻ polypus in nose ʼ;
H. pīnas m. ʻ catarrh ʼ, pinsī f. ʻ ulcer in nose ʼ.
